attributes.action: James McCormick should serve a life sentence.
attributes.additional_details:
James McCormick sold fake bomb detectors to Iraq, If they had real ones they would have had a fighting chance to stop bombs going off killing 1000s of innocent iraqi people. The mans hands are responsible and he should be held as if he sent the bombs of himself.

I feel he should be held in prison for a life sentence, and the 50 m he made should be paid out to the families of the innocent iraqi people.
